id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

enabled.description: A flag indicating whether the campaign is enabled.

creationTime.description: The time when the campaign was created.

lastModified.description: The last modification time of the campaign.

cpc.description: The cost per click for the campaign.

autoArchived.description: A flag indicating whether the campaign has been automatically archived.

minimumCpc.description: The minimum cost per click for the campaign.

currency.description: The currency used for the campaign.

platform.description: The platforms targeted by the campaign.

excludeAdBlockUsers.description: A flag indicating whether ad blocking users are excluded from targeting.

enabled.description: A flag indicating whether native placements are enabled.

includeCellularNetwork.description: A flag indicating whether cellular network users are included in targeting.

nativePlacementsEnabled.description: A flag indicating whether native placements are globally enabled.

locationsVersion.description: The version of locations used for targeting.

marketerId.description: The identifier of the marketer associated with the campaign.

autoExpirationOfAds.description: The strategy for automatically expiring ads within the campaign.

contentType.description: The type of content the campaign is promoting.

budget.description: Details about the budget for the campaign.

id.description: The unique identifier of the budget.

shared.description: A flag indicating whether the budget is shared.

amount.description: The budget amount for the campaign.

currency.description: The currency used for the budget.

creationTime.description: The time when the budget was created.

lastModified.description: The last modification time of the budget.

startDate.description: The start date of the budget.

endDate.description: The end date of the budget.

runForever.description: A flag indicating whether the budget runs forever.

type.description: The type of budget (e.g., daily, lifetime).

pacing.description: The pacing strategy for spending the budget.

prefixTrackingCode.description: Details about the prefix tracking code settings.

encode.description: A flag indicating whether the prefix code should be encoded.

liveStatus.description: Information about the live status of the campaign.

onAirReason.description: The reason for the on air status.

campaignOnAir.description: A flag indicating whether the campaign is on air.

amountSpent.description: The amount spent on the campaign.

onAirModificationTime.description: The time of the last on air modification.

readonly.description: A flag indicating whether the campaign is read-only.

startHour.description: The starting hour of the campaign.

trackingPixels.description: Tracking pixel settings for the campaign.

enabled.description: A flag indicating whether tracking pixels are enabled.

pixels.description: Pixel tracking configurations for the campaign.

onAirType.description: The type of on air status for the campaign.

objective.description: The objective or goal of the campaign.

creativeFormat.description: The format of the creative used in the campaign.

dynamicRetargeting.description: A flag indicating whether dynamic retargeting is enabled for the campaign.
